summary: After double-crossing the crime family he used to work for, a hit man must enroll in the Witness Protection Program. Unfortunately, he isn't very well protected.
cast: Eric Roberts|Esteban Powell|C. Thomas Howell|Farrah Forke|Damian Chapa|Lindsay Taylor|Eric Poppick|Michael D. Roberts|Brent Huff|Robert Miano|Paul Parducci|Lou Casal|Zeus Mendoza|Cole S. McKay|Justin Lundin|Merritt Yohnka|Tommy Poster|Bob Bragg|John Hoyt|George Katt|Jason Lester|Joe Viterelli
title: Testigo peligroso
